name: LVEFAssessment
title: LVEF Assessment
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The focus of this set of values is to identify that the assessment of LVEF has been ordered to be completed in a follow-up plan of treatment.),(Data Element Scope: Element maps to the Assessment category of the QDM.),(Inclusion Criteria: Included are tests to assess the Left ventricular ejection fraction.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excluded are codes that do not meet inclusion criteria.)
